thread.title: Reister, Perelman, Recognized at ASTA Global Conference
thread.title_full: Reister, Perelman, Recognized at ASTA Global Conference

title: Reister, Perelman, Recognized at ASTA Global Conference
text:
Last updated: 03:35 PM ET, Mon August 31 2015 Reister, Perelman, Recognized at ASTA Global Conference Travel Agent | American Society of Travel Agents (ASTA) | Claudette Covey | August 31, 2015 
In a nod to agency excellence and entrepreneurship, ASTA announced the winners of its Extra Mile and Entrepreneur of the Year awards during the opening session of the societyâ€™s global conference in Washington. 
Shelly Reister of Travel by That Girl was the recipient of the Extra Mile award, while Seth Perelman, founder of Automated Travel Systems (ATS), was the recipient of the Entrepreneur of the Year award.
